name: Sitetrada
overview:
Sitetrada is a rapidly growing marketplace for buying and selling internet assets. Sitetrada allows users to lease a fully functioning marketing platform.

As internet marketers look online for highly targeted ways to position their new products and services in front of their target audience they find many highly targeted publishing platforms (domains) are taken and they donâ€™t have time for buying, building-out, hosting and optimizing a domain.

Sitetradaâ€™s flexible platform provides transactions using the auction system, buy it now method, make an offer scenario or unique leasing option.

Sitetrada has thousands of keyword targeted domains available for long or short term lease. The sites are developed with relevant keyword targeted content and SEO optimized with indexing history and incoming traffic. And can be easily customized with marketerâ€™s brand and platform. Marketers can lease these domains to suit their marketing needs and return it to the owner when finished.

With 5,000 listings and growing, searching Sitetradaâ€™s active marketplace is easy to use with keyword or category searches. The valuation system provides pragmatic indicative measures of websites’ commercial value and the performance validation system ensures a safe environment for buyers, sellers and leasers.

Sitetrada is currently in closed beta release.
